name: Piopupu
description:
This is a collection of small games. Include: Three games to play hamster, cut map, flop.

Hit the hamster: Click the mouse and use a small hammer to hit the color hamster and let go of the gray hamster until the completion rate reaches 100%.
Cut Figure: Use the keyboard direction keys to move the smiley face, and put the smiley face into a circle. After the circle is closed, eliminate the squares in the circle until all the squares have eliminated the game.
Flop: Click the mouse to open two cards. When the opened pattern is the same, the pattern will be eliminated. If the opened picture is not erased, the pattern will remain hidden until the elimination of all the patterns is successful.(Hint: Screenshots to reduce difficulty)
To start each group of mini-games, you need to first complete the game with the click of a button. The faster the completion of the game is, the more health values you get and the easier to complete subsequent mini-games.


1, the game begins, the main menu level interface select the pool table, kitchen, bar in any scene to start the game.
2. First, complete a small game that uses the mouse to quickly click the button. The faster you get, the more health you get.
3. After the click is completed, follow the random checkpoints of the three games of hamster, cut, and flop. Need to pass all.
4, enter (*/ω＼*) after completion. (*/ω＼*) is automatically archived after passing, otherwise it is not archived.
5. When the degree of completion of each scene reaches or exceeds 100%, the entire content of the game is completed.
